headline: Wall Street Bulls Look Optimistic About Howmet (HWM): Should You Buy?
summary: According to the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), one should invest in Howmet (HWM). It is debatable whether this highly sought-after metric is effective because Wall Street analysts' recommendations tend to be overly optimistic. Would it be worth investing in the stock?

headline: See How Howmet Flies on Institutional Inflows
summary: Institutions push shares of Howmet Aerospace, Inc. (HWM) higher by 218% since first outlier inflow in May 2024.

headline: BTIG Maintains Buy on Howmet Aerospace, Raises Price Target to $275
summary: BTIG  analyst Andre Madrid   maintains Howmet Aerospace (NYSE:HWM) with a Buy and raises the price target from $240 to $275.
